publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2223 Margaret Jamieson: Stoddard International PLCâ€”That the Parliament expresses its concern that the receivers have been called into Stoddard International PLC, Kilmarnock, and urges all public agencies and politicians to work towards attracting a new owner who will sustain jobs for the loyal workforce and preserve the valuable skills of the carpet industry of Scotland in Kilmarnock. Supported by: Elaine Smith*, Robert Brown*, Kate Maclean*, Paul Martin*, Bill Butler*, Janis Hughes*, Ms Wendy Alexander*
S2M-2223 Stoddard International PLC (lodged on 7 January 2005) Jackie Baillie*, Pauline McNeill*, Alex Neil*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Marlyn Glen*
S2M-2223 Stoddard International PLC (lodged on 7 January 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Karen Whitefield*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Irene Oldfather*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-2223 Stoddard International PLC (lodged on 7 January 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Maureen Macmillan*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-2223 Stoddard International PLC (lodged on 7 January 2005) Scott Barrie*, Trish Godman*, John Swinburne*
S2M-2223 Stoddard International PLC (lodged on 7 January 2005) Murray Tosh*
S2M-2223 Stoddard International PLC (lodged on 7 January 2005) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
